Package photos.view

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
photos.view.Controller
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminController, AlbumDisplayController, LoginController, MyAlbumsController, PhotoDisplayController, SearchController
public abstract class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
Superclass of controllers for the main windows. Allows photo library data to be stored in a centralized location, and allows SceneManager to open secondary windows ("pop-ups") by referencing a general controller as the parent controller, rather than requiring separate methods.
Author:
Patrick Lee

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static boolean albumScope
    Indicates whether the user has most recently opened the Album Display Window (as opposed to the MyAlbums Window) for searching and transitioning purposes.
    static java.lang.String currAlbum
    A String indicating which album the current User is interacting with.
    static java.lang.String currPhoto
    A String indicating which photo the current User is interacting with (its file path).
    static User currUser
    The User object of the current user logged in.
    static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​User> users
    HashMap of users' data to be accessed by different controllers.

    • currPhoto

      public static java.lang.String currPhoto
      A String indicating which photo the current User is interacting with (its file path).

    • albumScope

      public static boolean albumScope
      Indicates whether the user has most recently opened the Album Display Window (as opposed to the MyAlbums Window) for searching and transitioning purposes. Set to true if the User was previously on the Album Display Window, and false otherwise.
